actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the indexation of the individual income tax rates shall take effect on January 1, 1982.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, as amended by the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981, to require that annual cost of living adjustments, based on the Consumer Price Index, to the individual income tax rates and the rates of income tax withholding shall take effect in 1982 (presently 1985).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the indexation of the individual income tax rates shall take effect on January 1, 1982.
